title: The Self-Proclaimed “Normal” Guy of The S-Class Academy - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Harem   Martial Arts   Romance   School Life
tags: Academy   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Bullying   Childhood Friends   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Showbiz   Student Council   Tsundere
author: 丸山ひま。   裕時 悠示
description:
Rua is the granddaughter of a powerful man and a very popular voice-over idol, and I have been living in the same position as a servant.
'You should be honored to be childhood friends with me!　Shashasha!'
But, but…..

One thing she did made me lose my temper.
I'm done with you, goodbye pig girl.

All this time I've been in the shadows, a draw for that Pig.
I thought I could finally live a normal life, but 'normal' is not so easy.
For some reason, I became popular with the beautiful girls of the S-class academy, where geniuses gather, one after another.

This is a story about a protagonist with hidden high specs who, after ' isolation' from the female protagonist, becomes popular all over the place, and was told, 'As expected of you,' 'As it should be,' regardless of his own will.

>
